thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale
thread.title: Wholesale & Retail Nursery

title: Wholesale & Retail Nursery
text: Questions Business Summary All Inclusive, this beautiful wholesale and retail plant nursery is nestled in a charming coastal city in Southeastern North Carolina. This business has seen substantial growth in the past 3 years with zero marketing and has already doubled its profits in 2015. Revenues are derived as follows: Wholesale to New Construction accounts for 50%, Wholesale to Residential about 20%, Wholesale to the Movie Industry about 5%, and Wholesale to Other, such as Government Entities is 10%, while 15% comes from Residential Retail. This company offers a new owner a successful business with stable revenues and good market growth. Financing negotiable for the right buyer. This exquisite nursery has been in business since 1982. The business is located on beautifully landscaped property that creates inspiration for clients, resulting in increased purchases. They have a simple, easy, beautifully done website showing all the plants they carry and a wonderful plant care guide for customers. After years of hard work and loyal customers standing true throughout the years, the current owners have other interests. This business for sale is a great opportunity to take a business that is already successful and build on that foundation to secure your future. This business could be operated in a hands-on or absentee fashion giving the owner the ability to enjoy a flexible schedule and as much control of business activities as desired. Vehicles and equipment are included in the sale. Inventory varies and is to be negotiated at time of sale. Asking $2,300,000.00. 80% repeat clientele. This listing includes the property. There are 15.5 acres, two ponds and a nice home included on the property. There are three single level business buildings in good overall condition, an Office Building of 392 sq. ft., Employee Building of 399 sq. ft. and Garage of 1,200 sq. ft. The fully landscaped property also includes ample acreage of nursery space and a 2,400 sq. ft. residence. Financials
